vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
συνανά-κειμαι,
passive, recline together at table, [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to eat with, have dinner withdine
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to eat with, have dinner withdine
to recline with, someone at table, Mt. 9:10; 14:9; Mk. 2:15; 6:22; Lk. 7:49; 14:10, 15*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: sentarse a la mesa con, comer con ; invitado
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) (斜靠在桌旁進餐) 同吃
1a) (分詞) 賓客 (太 14:9)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) (斜靠在桌旁进餐) 同吃
1a) (分词) 宾客 (太 14:9)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: đến ngồi ăn với; ngồi cùng bàn với. σύν (G4862) + ἀνάκειμαι (G345)
